profileAlternative.name: Gabriel Madureira
profileAlternative.headline: Sr Director, Growth Operations and Web at MongoDB
profileAlternative.summary: With a career that features 10+ years in senior-level roles of increasing scope and responsibility, I'm currently looking to solidify my position as a marketing executive. I'm a dynamic, proactive, and confident individual with the ability to excel independently or within team-oriented environments. My positive attitude serves as both a source of self-motivation and a model for peers, teammates and clients. In short, I'm a seasoned, likable, and award-winning leader with the ability to impact operations on a long-term basis.

positions.title: Sr Director, Growth Operations and Web
positions.description: Managing teams to expand the growth at MongoDB.

positions.title: Director, Marketing Operations and Growth
positions.description:
My current role has me leading marketing projects and activities across various departments, including sales, marketing, business operations, and analytics. In addition, I lead a team of highly skilled peers in general technology, process / project management, budgeting, forecasting, and analytics.

Specific accomplishments include:

► Building a team that paved the way for a new scale of demand generation
► Implementing new channels and strategies to strengthen success across the marketing department
► Pioneering new lead flow and marketing automation, ultimately bolstering revenue
► Managing lead flow, scoring, and influence models to improve sales leads

…
see more

positions.title: Sprinklr
positions.description:
My prior role saw me in charge of teammates positioned globally focused on operations and tech stack for sales and marketing.

Specific accomplishments include:

► Re-engineering Salesforce from near-deprecated to delivering exceptional service for nine companies in the span of less than one year
► Establishing a quote-to-cash process (CPQ+Billing) to strengthen forecasts and improve long-term profitability
► Direct 10 teammates in day-to-day activities and operations
…
see more

Title
Digital Marketing Director
positions.description:
This opportunity gave me the chance to develop and maintain a new company website and marketing tech stack. Not only did I collate more than 15 different marketing solutions into a unified tech stack, but I also took advantage of the latest automation strategies to jumpstart productivity and ensure consistent results.

Specific accomplishments include:

► Maintaining responsibility for marketing, web, and analytics in marketing
► Managing 15 people across three different countries, including USA, India, and Brazil

positions.title: COO
positions.description:
This role put me in charge of 80 personnel across multiple departments. The company was eventually acquired by Sprinkly.

Specific accomplishments include:

► Drove business growth of 30% YoY
► Executed the process of M&A with Sprinklr
► Drove workforce management and engagement, ultimately growing the staff from 35 members to 130 and doubling revenue within a span of two short years

see more

positions.title: Head of Operations
positions.description:
My initial role with Scup put me in direct contact with various organizational figureheads in support of ongoing company internationalization. I also created and maintained relationships with popular social media sites, including Facebook and Twitter, and participated in a highly successful round of funding on behalf of the company.

Specific accomplishments include:

► Introducing best-in-class processes for use in sales, marketing, and engineering
► Hiring and management of teams
► Established processes and metrics to support the growth of the business

positions.title: Business Development Manager
positions.description: I played a critical role in the business strategy of this startup business that was in the development stages of free enterprise resource planning software. I modeled their initial revenue streams and go-to-market strategies while organizing, preparing, and supporting various rounds of funding.

positions.title: Hypermarcas S/A
positions.description: One of my earlier roles, this job put me in direct oversight of sales and operations planning. Not only did I participate in more than 200 different product launches during this time, but I also created and implemented post-merger plans to support recent company acquisitions.

given.text:
Tiphany is amazing! A hard working smart girl that will pursue the solution to the problem until the end. Her skills in sales ops are impressive and her commitment to making the right thing makes her a unique professional. I've worked with her at Spinklr and it has hard to say the moment when she was not the most passionate and dedicated person in the room. Even in the worst moments, she was always with the best vibe and focus to get the job done. Reach out to me if you need more information but this one I definitely recommend!
…
See more

I've worked with Mauro on projects that had different scopes but always with a high complexity and time pressure. His commitment to getting things done along with his high-quality standard makes him a unique mix of speed and quality. Always engaged and motivating the team.
Edgar is a self-motivated extraordinary professional. His skills and commitment to get it done made our time together a pleasant moment.

Eliana é uma excelente profissional que trabalha muito bem em grupo. Consegue realizar suas tarefas dentro do prazo e qualidade esperados por todos. Tem responsabilidade e senso de urgência impecáveis. Foi muito bom ter trabalhado com ela.

Leonardo mostrou no projeto que trabalhamos juntos uma excelente capacidade técnica aliada a um grande compromisso com as expectativas e resultados necessários ao negócio de uma forma que nunca havia visto antes em uma pessoa da área de TI. Foi um grande prazer trabalhar com esse excelente profissional.

items: Winner of the 1st USP Innovation Olympic Game
Winner of Best Innovative Product Project
Alliances in complex projects: a study of an EPC project
